Hi Jim - 

Interesting kantei #2 tsuba. Could this fall into Yagyu or possibly Hoan work? Resembles Kanayama but with that linear bone and lack of other "knobby" bones, I would look more to Yagyu (but it lacks the "peak" in its shape") or Hoan. I'm not very familiar with Hoan though. 

Ron
STL

  From: Jim Gilbert 
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com

  Subject: [nihontostudy] Kantei Tsuba #2


  Glad to hear that people enjoyed the first kantei session.  Here are a couple of snapshots I took of a friend's guard.  Sorry for the blown out highlight in the rim photo, but there is no way for me to reshoot this any time soon.  Note that there is a long, linear bone just below the highlight.

  http://ph.groups.yahoo.com/group/nihontostudy/photos/browse/27a4

  Jim
